faqs.question: How to add a new customer?
faqs.answer: Go to Customers page, click 'Add Customer', fill the form and submit.

faqs.question: How to track income?
faqs.answer: Go to Income page to see monthly income, summary and recent transactions.

faqs.question: How to manage products?
faqs.answer: Navigate to Products page. You can see all products in a responsive grid layout.

faqs.question: How to promote campaigns?
faqs.answer: Use Promote page to create, track and monitor your campaigns.
